biotools.summary:
Multiple sequence alignment program with a command-line interface (Clustal W) and a graphical user interface (Clustal X). The display colours allow conserved features to be highlighted for easy viewing in the alignment. It is available for several platforms, including Windows, Macintosh PowerMac, Linux and Solaris.
Names occassionally spelled also as Clustal W2, ClustalW2, ClustalW, ClustalX, Clustal2.
